summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1264 for the improvement of Railroad Avenue, from Atlantic Street to Broad Street; Broad Street, Union Street, Madison Street and Yesler Way, each from Western Avenue to Railroad Avenue; Jackson Street, from First Avenue South to Railroad Avenue; and Western Avenue, from Virginia Street to Yesler Way, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains, together with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 13900 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
